means: 阻碍，妨碍( hinder的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: If she wants to start afresh. I have only too obvious reasons for not hindering her.
sentence.Network_cn: 她要是想重新安家立业, 那我毫无理由去妨碍她.

sentence.Network_en: The man was a disgrace to the Council, always interfering and hindering the business.
sentence.Network_cn: 那个人对市议会来说是个大耻辱, 老是捣乱和阻挠工作的进行.

sentence.Network_en: An former injury was hindering him from playing his best.
sentence.Network_cn: 旧伤使他无法发挥出最高水平.

PerfectNetExp.abs: are , however , still two obstacles hindering the expansion of tourism in our country ., 然而 , 仍然存在两个障碍妨碍着旅游业的发展.
system factor of hindering the investment bank development ., 浅析制约投资银行发展的体制因素.

one is the addition of epoxy silicone as the cross linker and the other is the addition of hindering organosilicon that can be copolymerized directly in the soap-free emulsion polymerization .一种方法是通过添加环氧硅氧烷偶联剂达到改性的目的；一种是通过添加阻碍性有机硅直接参与无皂乳液聚合反应的改性方法。

... ◎ 拖债[ default a debt] ◎ 拖后腿[ hinder (or impede) sb.;be a drag on sb.;hold sb. back] (2) 同本义[ drag;haul;pull].

entry.def: If something hinders you, it makes it more difficult for you to do something or make progress.

example.ex: Does the fact that your players are part-timers help or hinder you?...
example.tran: 队员们都是兼职的，这对你有利还是不利？

example.ex: Further investigation was hindered by the loss of all documentation on the case.
example.tran: 由于案件卷宗全部丢失致使进一步的调查受阻。

entry.def: If something hinders your movement, it makes it difficult for you to move forward or move around.

example.ex: A thigh injury increasingly hindered her mobility...
example.tran: 大腿受伤使她行动愈发不便。

example.ex: Landslides and bad weather are continuing to hinder the arrival of relief supplies to the area.
example.tran: 滑坡和恶劣天气仍在阻碍救援物资运送到该地区。

sentences.sentence: "the clogging crowds of revelers overflowing into the street"

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then they berated it for hindering Chiang Kai-shek's reconquest of the mainland.
